I am a marketing, developer relations, and product management professional with experience that demonstrates business acumen and a proven track record in strategizing, designing, and implementing the delivery of flagship marketing campaigns/events, software product strategies, and developer relations programs. My core professional strengths are centered around creating global ecoystem plans, managing and building cross-functional teams, executing programs within budget guidelines, and using social media channels to drive corporate-level goals.
